method.desc: The string to pass to scipy.optimize.minimize so it knows what to use

desc.disp: Set to True to print convergence messages
desc.pgtol: Gradient tolerance: if gradient_i > gtol for all i, exit
desc.epsilon: Step size to use in numerically evaluating gradient
desc.approx_grad: Whether to approximate the gradient numerically (in which case func returns only the function value).
